channel.title: [pi]slayer task reset command?[pi]
channel.description: can anyone help make one with me? i have a lot of players who get skeletons as a slayer task, but there invisible and unattackable, so i wanna add a command to reset there tasks, if anyone can tell me how that would be great! ty dun dun dun

item.title: [pi]slayer task reset command?[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Wouldn’t it be better if you take the NPC that is not attackable off the slayer task array? That way you just destroyed a glitch/bug.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]slayer task reset command?[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m not sure how your slayer system works, but a rough ideas would be:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("resettask")) { //command name
		c.taskAmount = -1; //vars
		c.slayerTask = 0;  //vars
                                                        
	} //end

The variables might be different, I’m just basing this of memory of PI.

Read full topic
